1stParagraph: I'm a mechatronics engineer with 10 years of professional experience in different manufacturing industries (automotive, metal-mechanic, plastics, food, etc), in different positions (automation, maintenance, production, engineering, quality, projects, etc).
2ndParagraph: During the last few years, I found a real passion for programming and becoming a developer, so I started studying Mobile development technologies, and then I decided to start a Bootcamp (Henry) in order to become a Fullstack Developer.
techStack: The tech stack that I have used:
needHelp?: What can I do for you?
SuppToCust: Support to customers in their sites.
NewTouchPanel: New touch control panel for a John Deere plant.
NewPLC: PLC substitution for a Johnson Controls plant.
SCADA: SCADA application for a Johnson Controls plant.
PLCProg: PLC programming for a Johnson Controls plant.
ElectricalSchemes: Electrical schematic design for different projects.
MJD: Project and Machining Process Engineer at John Deere.
DELPHI: Machining Process Engineer at Delphi Diesel Systems.
PKCQE: Automotive Quality Engineer at PKC Group.
HENNIGES: Process and Quality Engineer at Henniges Automotive.
MOTHERSON: Automotive Senior Quality Engineer at Motherson Group.
SMP: Manufacturing Supervisor at SMP Automotive Alambama.
CreateCodebase: Create a scalable and maintainable codebase.
DesignUI: UI Design and new features for applications.
DeployGCP: Deploy applications using Google Cloud Services.
WriteTests: Write unit tests for new features and bug fixes.
